name: Fear Of Gears
description:
Tick, tock. Tick, tock.

The sound of rumbling clockwork surrounds you. Transient portals to other realities open nearby, releasing extradimensional mechanical monstrosities. All the while, the massive clock face beneath you ticks ever closer to 12...

Fear of Gears is a fast-paced roguelite adventure that takes place in a strange time loop. Made in just 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47! 

(press F for fullscreen)

Features: 

-Dash and slash, swinging your sword about to fend off your cosmic foes in wave-based combat!
-Choose from a variety of upgrades, including infesting your body with a dark presence from another void and infusing your sword with the power of the cosmos to fire a searing beam of energy
-Face the consequences of your actions: each upgrade you choose also empowers your foes!
-Meet a familiar face when the clock strikes 12
-Do it all again, only better, in the next time loop!
